articles.description: MG has launched a new 7-seater Savvy variant of the Gloster. It is priced at Rs. 37.28 lakh (ex-showroom). 'Savvy' is the top-of-the-line variant of the Gloster. Until recently, it was only available in a 6-seat configuration. In the new 7-seater version, the…
articles.content:
MG has launched a new 7-seater Savvy variant of the Gloster. It is priced at Rs. 37.28 lakh (ex-showroom).

articles.title: Cryptocurrency Will Take Over Rupee and Dollar in Future - Analytics Insight
